vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
FindThisHash.solve (patch_18.sol#8-11) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(1000000000000000000000) (patch_18.sol#10)

solc-version

Detected issues with version pragma in patch_18.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (patch_18.sol#1): it allows old versions
